actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to limit the availability and use of handgun bullets that are capable of penetrating certain body armor.
short_title: Law Enforcement Officers Protection Act of 1982

summary.text: Law Enforcement Officers Protection Act of 1982 - Establishes criminal penalties applicable to licensees under the Gun Control Act of 1968 who import, manufacture, or sell a "restricted handgun bullet," except as authorized by the Secretary of the Treasury. Establishes additional criminal penalties, including a mandatory minimum sentence of one year imprisonment, for: (1) using a restricted handgun bullet to commit a Federal felony; or (2) carrying a restricted handgun bullet unlawfully during commission of a Federal felony.

titles.title: Law Enforcement Officers Protection Act of 1982
A bill to limit the availability and use of handgun bullets that are capable of penetrating certain body armor.
